title: Pure on Raw
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, All Raw
description: Opened in fall 2012, this is a raw and vegan cafe. Has sweet breakfast menu, appetizers, salads, mains, specials, desserts, smoothies and juices, and a Sunday menu. Monday movie nights 7-9.30pm. Also offers a raw food meal delivery service with option to collect at the cafe. Confirmed all vegan Oct 2015.
